function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for global COVID-19 response to detract from focus on climate action","Impact":"Delay or hinder progress in addressing the climate crisis","Mitigation":"Balanced approach to addressing both COVID-19 and climate action, clear communication of interconnected goals","Technologies":"Communication and coordination platforms for international collaboration","People":"Global population, particularly in areas vulnerable to climate change","Owner":"Global leadership, governments, international organizations"},{"Description":"Doubts about effectiveness of European Green Deal (EGD) in addressing climate crisis","Impact":"Lack of progress in addressing climate crisis, skepticism about EGD's impact","Mitigation":"Continuous assessment and adaptation of EGD initiatives, engagement with stakeholders and experts for feedback and improvement","Technologies":"Monitoring and evaluation systems for environmental impact, data-driven decision-making tools","People":"EU policymakers, environmental experts, stakeholders in climate action","Owner":"European Union, environmental agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Resistance and recalcitrance of coal-dependent Member States","Impact":"Undermining EU action on climate, continuation of reliance on fossil fuels","Mitigation":"Diplomatic negotiations, incentives for transition to renewable energy, support for alternative economic opportunities","Technologies":"Renewable energy technology, carbon capture and storage, economic diversification tools","People":"Citizens in coal-dependent Member States, EU policymakers, renewable energy industry","Owner":"EU leadership, renewable energy industry, international advocacy organizations, affected communities"}]}
